name: One Room Hotel (ManuScythe)
description:
Description:
You are the chicky owner of a Hotel with just one room.

The poor blind clients keep coming and you have to divide the room for more guests to cash in!

Win & Lose condition:
Accomodate as many guests as you can in the same room without them noticing.

How usurer can you get??

-------------------------
Controls
Left Click: Build vertical wall.
Right Click: Build horizontal wall.
-----------------------

(Click on the "Play" sign on the reception table to start playing)

->>->> Let everyone know how much money you made in the comments below! <<-<<-
